A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film had a lot of potential but unfortunately the writer seemed to be too concerned with creating boring plot twists and pointless sub-plots which took up way too much time. The affect of this is a movie with no character development\, and no drama. A multitude of marvellous emotionless action sequences permeated with cringeworthy humour. Not to mention the fact that it completely undermines the other films that come before it.
